newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: SOCCER-HUETTER REPLACES PROSENIK IN AUSTRIAN WORLD CUP SQUAD.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-HUETTER REPLACES PROSENIK IN AUSTRIAN WORLD CUP SQUAD.

text.p: Austrian coach Herbert Prohaska called up Adi Huetter to replace injured midfielder Christian Prosenik for their World Cup group four qualifier against Sweden on Wednesday.
Prosenik of Rapid Vienna, has not fully recovered from an ankle injury sustained in a first division match last month.
However, Huetter, who plays for Salzburg will only be Prohaska's second choice for the match behind Markus Schopp of Hamburg.
